categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, a clone trooper unit was active and led by Jedi General Eeth Koth and Clone Captain "Lock". Clone troopers of the unit were equipped with Phase I clone trooper armor, which featured green and yellow markings. In 21 BBY, the unit was stationed on the Venator-class Star Destroyer Steadfast when it was attacked by Supreme Commander General Grievous aboard his Recusant-class Commerce Guild destroyer in the Saleucami system. Captain Lock and his troops were ordered to evacuate the cruiser by Jedi Master Koth, who was captured by Grievous soon after.
